channel.title: CVE Feed for advcomsys.com -- oneVote component for Joomla
channel.description: The latest CVEs for advcomsys.com -- oneVote component for Joomla

item.title: CVE-2023-23756|2024-08-04T08:41:46.104Z -- advcomsys.com -- onevote%20component%20for%20joomla
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in advcomsys.com oneVote component for Joomla. It allows XSS Targeting Non-Script Elements.
